name: Glorch's Great Escape: Walking is for Chumps
description: Why walk when you can teleport? Control Glorch in a challenging puzzle platformer where your only weapon is the almighty "Telenade." Navigate difficult platforming puzzles, find some secrets, smash a few robots, and try your best not to die.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3/AMD A8 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 35 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5/AMD A10 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 600/Radeon HD 6000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse (not touchpad) recommended
